nodes.text: Zokor Polpot was Vice Chancellor of the University of Coruscant. In an attempt to discredit his boss, Polpot stole the head of 8t88, chief droid administrator of the Woostri HoloScan Database, during a Woostri visit. The prank resulted in the chancellor's resignation, paving the way for Polpot to become UC head. Chancellor Polopot later died during a visit to Mawan, with 8t88 the suspected perpetrator.
